-e ---

𒇻 LU ⇔ allo or
or < oder either < weder...weder whether either and:
𒌑 U ú ओ o < و व 𓍢 va (with) < एवं evã ⲁⲩⲱ < 𓍢ϱ اور aur और я OR ⲟⲩⲟϩ (and) < অপৰ apara (apart)
𐎜 ʾō वा wā 𐍅𐌰𐌿 wau •orva™

𓂋 𓏤 𓊪 𓅱 | (conjunctive) or | r-pw ar'po > arba@Lithuanian +++ alebo abo
𓂋 𓏤 𓊪 𓅱 | (conjunctive) or | ar'pwo > あるいは arui wa ++
